title: Application Status Update
body: Your application for Microsoft Software Engineering Internship has been reviewed.

title: New Internship Opportunity
body: New internship positions available at Google matching your profile.

title: Report Submission Reminder
body: Don't forget to submit your internship report for QNB by next week.

title: Workshop Invitation
body: You're invited to attend 'Career Development Workshop' next Monday.

title: Profile Update Required
body: Please update your skills and experience in your profile.

title: Interview Scheduled
body: Your interview with Microsoft has been scheduled for next Tuesday at 2 PM.

title: Application Accepted
body: Congratulations! Your application for the Marketing Internship at Nestle has been accepted.
